signals.problem_statement: The customer is struggling with managing a single shared inbox, leading to confusion and double responses among team members.
signals.context: Single shared inbox (info@wag-bone.com) managed by three people, with plans to scale as business grows.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a way to systemize email management to prevent team members from forwarding emails unnecessarily.
signals.context: Current workflow involves forwarding emails to the admin for responses, causing inefficiencies.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a solution that has a low learning curve for their team to adopt.
signals.context: Team of about seven people, with two currently managing the inbox and plans to add more.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires a way to track email responses and manage workload distribution among team members.
signals.context: Team of three managing customer inquiries, with plans to scale up.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is interested in automating responses and managing customer satisfaction surveys after ticket closure.
signals.context: Looking to improve customer engagement and feedback processes.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs to manage requests coming from multiple channels, including Instagram messaging, which is currently unsupported.
signals.context: Currently only managing emails and website chat, with plans to expand to other channels.
